entry.en: Enable customers to understand your specific investment methods and model features.
entry.zh: 让客户了解您的具体投资方法和模型特点。

entry.en: such as data-driven models, market neutral strategies, etc.
entry.zh: 如基于数据驱动的模型、市场中性策略等。

entry.en: Main strategies such as trend tracking, arbitrage trading, and intraday high-frequency trading.
entry.zh: 趋势跟踪、套利交易、日内高频交易等主要策略。

entry.en: How to reduce the risks caused by market fluctuations through scientific methods.
entry.zh: 如何通过科学方法降低市场波动带来的风险。

entry.en: Use charts or data to demonstrate the long-term effects of strategies (compliant).
entry.zh: 用图表或数据展示策略的长期效果（需合规）。
